about_the_game:
Taking place on planet Earth, Friends 0: The Last Stand is a top down ability-based wave defense, where Buddy and you are the only things standing between human civilization and it's impending doom.

Run and dodge out of the way of enemy attacks, simultaneously controlling Buddy, using it's abilities to defend, attack and enhance yourself against the enemy onslaught.

War against over a dozen enemy types, each using different attack patterns and strategies, rising in difficulty the longer you hold out.

Upgrade Buddy to further enhance their and your own abilities using shops located around the map, which enemies will try to destroy.

Unlock up to 12 abilities and 3 modifications to each, 36 options total and more coming!

Friends 0 is designed with multiplayer in mind, rise to the top of the leaderboards using teamwork and strategies to stop your enemies in their tracks!

This is the beginning of the story of the Friends Universe, piece together how we got here using easter eggs hidden around the maps and join us in writing it's history.

short_description: Defend the earth from a robot-alien invasion, joined by Buddy, a Friend rebelling against its people. Utilize its abilities to defend your base against hordes of enemies, buy upgrades and compete on the leaderboard! Play with friends or stand alone in this fight for human civilization!
